test_suites.description: Test cases to verify successful login scenarios

test_cases.title: Successful login with valid credentials
preconditions: User is registered and active
User is on the login page
steps: Enter a valid registered email address
test_cases.expected_result: User is redirected to the dashboard. A valid session token is created.

test_cases.title: Successful login with username instead of email
preconditions: User is registered and active
Application supports username login
test_cases.expected_result: User is successfully logged in and redirected to the dashboard.

test_cases.title: Login with email in different cases (case-insensitivity)
preconditions: User is registered with email 'validuser@example.com'
test_cases.expected_result: Login is successful; email field is treated as case-insensitive.

test_cases.title: Login with 'Remember Me' checkbox enabled
preconditions: User is registered and active
steps: Close the browser and reopen the application
test_cases.expected_result: User remains logged in after reopening the browser. A persistent cookie is set.

test_cases.title: Verify redirect to originally requested page after login
preconditions: User is not logged in and tries to access a protected page
steps: Navigate to a protected URL directly (e.g., /dashboard/profile)
System redirects user to the login page
test_cases.expected_result: User is redirected to '/dashboard/profile' after successful login.

test_suites.description: Test cases to verify system behavior on invalid login attempts

test_cases.title: Login with incorrect password
preconditions: User is registered and active
User is on the login page
test_cases.expected_result: Login fails. An error message 'Invalid email or password' is displayed. User remains on the login page.

test_cases.title: Login with unregistered email
preconditions: User is on the login page
steps: Enter an email that is not registered
test_cases.expected_result: Login fails. Error message displayed: 'Invalid email or password'. System does not reveal whether the email exists.

test_cases.title: Login with empty email and password fields
preconditions: User is on the login page
steps: Leave both email and password fields empty
test_cases.expected_result: Form validation triggers. Error messages shown: 'Email is required' and 'Password is required'.

test_cases.title: Login with invalid email format
preconditions: User is on the login page
test_cases.expected_result: Form validation error: 'Please enter a valid email address'.

test_cases.title: Login with SQL injection in credentials
preconditions: User is on the login page
steps: Enter SQL injection string in the email field
test_cases.expected_result: Login fails. No database error is exposed. System handles the input safely.

test_cases.title: Login with a disabled/deactivated account
preconditions: A user account exists but has been deactivated by admin
steps: Enter the email of the deactivated account
test_cases.expected_result: Login fails. Error message: 'Your account has been deactivated. Please contact support.'

test_suites.description: Test cases for the password recovery flow

test_cases.title: Request password reset with a registered email
preconditions: User is registered
User is on the login page
steps: Click on 'Forgot Password?' link on the login page
test_cases.expected_result: Success message: 'A password reset link has been sent to your email.' Email is received within 2 minutes.

test_cases.title: Request password reset with an unregistered email
preconditions: User is on the Forgot Password page
steps: Enter an email that is not registered
test_cases.expected_result: Generic success message is shown to prevent user enumeration: 'If this email is registered, a reset link will be sent.' No email is sent.

test_cases.title: Verify password reset link expiry
preconditions: User has received a password reset email
Reset link has expired (e.g., after 60 minutes)
steps: Click on the reset link after it has expired
Attempt to set a new password
test_cases.expected_result: Error page is displayed: 'This password reset link has expired. Please request a new one.'

test_cases.title: Successfully reset password using a valid link
preconditions: User has received a valid, unexpired reset link
steps: Click on the valid reset link from email
test_cases.expected_result: Password is updated. User can log in successfully with the new password. Old password is no longer valid.

test_cases.title: Reset password using an already-used reset link
preconditions: User has already used the reset link once to change the password
steps: Try to open the same link again in the browser
test_cases.expected_result: Error: 'This reset link has already been used and is no longer valid.'

test_cases.title: Reset password with mismatched passwords
preconditions: User is on the Reset Password page with a valid link
steps: Enter a different value in the 'Confirm Password' field
test_cases.expected_result: Validation error: 'Passwords do not match.' Password is not updated.

test_suites.description: Test cases to verify session management and expiry behavior

test_cases.title: Session expires after inactivity timeout
preconditions: User is logged in
Session timeout is set to 30 minutes
steps: Leave the application idle for more than 30 minutes
Attempt to perform any action or navigate to a new page
test_cases.expected_result: User is automatically logged out and redirected to the login page with message: 'Your session has expired. Please log in again.'

test_cases.title: Accessing a protected page after session expiry
preconditions: User's session has expired
steps: After session expiry, manually type a protected URL in the browser address bar
test_cases.expected_result: User is redirected to the login page. The protected page content is NOT accessible.

test_cases.title: Session invalidated after explicit logout
preconditions: User is logged in
steps: Copy the session token from cookies/headers
Try to use the copied session token to make an API request to a protected endpoint
test_cases.expected_result: Session token is invalidated server-side. API request returns 401 Unauthorized. The old session cannot be reused.

test_cases.title: Concurrent session handling (same user, multiple devices)
preconditions: User logs in from Device A
steps: Log in with the same credentials on Device B
Try to perform an action on Device A
test_cases.expected_result: Depending on policy: Either the session on Device A is terminated (single session policy), or both sessions remain active (multi-session policy). Behavior matches the application's defined policy.

test_suites.description: Test cases to verify account lockout protection against brute-force attacks

test_cases.title: Account locked after maximum failed login attempts
preconditions: User account is active
Lockout policy: lock after 5 failed attempts
steps: Enter the valid email with an incorrect password
test_cases.expected_result: After the 5th failed attempt, the account is locked. Error message: 'Your account has been temporarily locked due to multiple failed login attempts. Try again after 15 minutes or reset your password.'

test_cases.title: Verify locked account cannot login even with correct password
preconditions: User account is in a locked state
steps: Enter the correct email and correct password of the locked account
test_cases.expected_result: Login is denied. Error message displayed about the account being locked. The correct password does not bypass the lockout.

test_cases.title: Account automatically unlocks after lockout duration expires
preconditions: User account is locked
Lockout duration is 15 minutes
steps: Wait for the lockout duration (15 minutes) to expire
Enter the correct email and password
test_cases.expected_result: After 15 minutes, the account is automatically unlocked. Login succeeds with correct credentials.
